thread.title: Daniel Craig, Lea Seydoux, stars gather for Bond premiere
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig, Lea Seydoux, stars gather for Bond premiere - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Daniel Craig, Lea Seydoux, stars gather for Bond premiere
text:
Photo: Matt Crossick, AP Image 1 of / 2 2 Actor Daniel Craig who, portrays James Bond attends the World Premiere of the new James Bond movie Spectre, held at the Royal Albert Hall in London Monday Oct. 26, 2015.(Matt Crossick/PA via AP) UNITED KINGDOM OUT Actor Daniel Craig who, portrays James Bond attends the World Premiere of the new James Bond movie Spectre, held at the Royal Albert Hall in London Monday Oct. 26, 2015.(Matt Crossick/PA via AP) UNITED KINGDOM ... more Image 2 of 2 Actor Daniel Craig who, portrays James Bond attends the World Premiere of the new James Bond movie Spectre, held at the Royal Albert Hall in London Monday Oct. 26, 2015.(Matt Crossick/PA via AP) UNITED KINGDOM OUT Actor Daniel Craig who, portrays James Bond attends the World Premiere of the new James Bond movie Spectre, held at the Royal Albert Hall in London Monday Oct. 26, 2015.(Matt Crossick/PA via AP) UNITED KINGDOM ... more Daniel Craig, Lea Seydoux, stars gather for Bond premiere 1 / 2 Back to Gallery LONDON (AP) â€” James Bond is back, and the stars of the latest 007 flick are gathering for the world premiere of "Spectre" at London's Royal Albert Hall.
Daniel Craig , in a dark tuxedo, drew cheers as he signed autographs and posed for selfies with fans along the red carpet Monday evening.
Lea Seydoux wore a shimmering gold backless gown for the night that marked her emergence as the latest in a long line of romantic interests for the suave British agent.
They were joined by Christoph Waltz, the Academy Award winner recruited to play the villain, who challenges Bond in a series of exotic locales.
The premiere is expected to draw a strong royal presence including Prince William , his wife Kate, and Prince Harry .
British critics have praised the film.
